name: Zac Williamson
story: Zac has been pushing zero-knowledge research since before most people knew what zk meant. As CEO, he’s leading Aztec toward a future where Ethereum can be both programmable and private.

name: Joe Andrews
story: Joe blends strategy with deep product sense. He connects Aztec’s technical breakthroughs to a bigger mission: building the privacy layer that makes Ethereum unstoppable.

name: Lisa Cuesta Bunin
story: Lisa keeps Aztec’s engine running. With experience in SaaS and venture, she ensures the team has the structure and support to scale privacy-first infrastructure globally.

name: Claire Kart
story: Claire is the storyteller behind Aztec. She translates complex cryptography into narratives that resonate with people and helps the world see why privacy on-chain matters.

name: Andre Omietanski
story: Andre is Aztec’s legal compass. He navigates the uncertain waters of regulation and decentralization, ensuring Aztec can push boundaries while staying grounded in compliance.

name: Alejo Amiras
story: Alejo is focused on growing Aztec’s ecosystem. He works with builders and communities to bring real apps onto the network and make programmable privacy accessible to everyone.

name: Pedro
story: Pedro lives and breathes developer experience. As DevRel engineer, he helps builders get hands-on with Noir and the Aztec stack, turning ideas into live zk-powered apps.

name: Kelsey Ruiz
story: Kelsey drives communications at Aztec. From press to community messaging, she makes sure Aztec’s voice is clear, consistent, and inspiring across the entire crypto space.

name: Steve Kenny
story: Steve leads business development, forging partnerships that align with Aztec’s mission. He’s focused on building bridges with projects that value privacy and decentralization.

name: Amin
story: Amin is shaping how Aztec decentralizes. He coordinates validators and node operators, ensuring the network grows stronger and more resilient every step of the way.

name: David Steinrueck
story: David makes Aztec’s products understandable. He connects features to user benefits and makes sure the narrative highlights how privacy-first infrastructure changes everything.

name: Jake Schaeffer
story: Jake is all about Noir. As PMM, he helps developers and the world understand why Aztec’s zk language is a game-changer for private-by-default applications.

name: Harsh Bajpai
story: Harsh drives growth at Aztec. From engaging with communities to helping projects accelerate, he’s focused on making privacy-first crypto impossible to ignore.

name: Arnaud Schenk
story: Arnaud is a steward of both Aztec and Noir. He focuses on governance, ecosystem building, and ensuring Aztec’s vision is carried forward with integrity and impact.

name: Josh Crites
story: Josh is on the frontlines of Aztec’s growth. He builds relationships, spreads the privacy message, and helps ensure Aztec reaches the audiences that matter most.

name: 0xRahul
story: Rahul is leading Aztec’s testnet efforts. He ensures the protocol is stress-tested, secure, and ready for the demands of scaling privacy to millions of users.

name: Savio
story: Savio is a product manager for Noir, Aztec’s zk language. He bridges cryptography and usability, making sure developers can build private apps without friction.

name: Hazbobo
story: Hazbobo advises Aztec on strategy and product direction. With a history in DeFi, he brings perspective to how privacy can reshape finance and beyond.

name: Amal Ibraymi
story: Amal is part of the legal team, focused on protecting Aztec’s mission in a rapidly shifting regulatory environment. Privacy needs advocates, and Amal is one of them.

name: Saleel
story: Saleel is both an engineer and DevRel. He codes, teaches, and supports builders who are experimenting with privacy tech and bringing Noir to life.

name: Roberto
story: Roberto is Aztec’s community lead. He connects with users daily, builds trust, and ensures the community has a voice in shaping the future of private Ethereum.
